trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Contém estilos de borda para células em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle permite que você personalize totalmente sua aparência, incluindo as bordas de células e cabeçalhos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> tem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> propriedades que permitem que você defina a aparência da borda da célula.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você precisar personalizar ainda mais as bordas, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> classe permite que você defina o estilo da borda nas laterais das células individuais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> propriedades de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> representar esquerda, direita, superior e inferior de uma célula, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir essas propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> para produzir várias aparências para as bordas entre as células.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adjusts the cell borders of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> so that a double border separates the interior cells and the top left header cell from the row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ajusta as bordas da célula de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> para que uma borda dupla separa as células interiores e a célula do cabeçalho esquerda superior de cabeçalhos de linha e coluna.

trans-unit.source: This sample demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustColumnHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.AdjustRowHeaderBorderStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> métodos e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdjustedTopLeftHeaderBorderStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: These members use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> objects to modify individual cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Usem esses membros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> objetos para modificar as bordas de células individuais.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse construtor.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de borda para todas as bordas de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> propriedades não estão definidas para o mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> valor, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A> é o valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a configuração dessa propriedade não são valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> válidos.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado ao definir essa propriedade é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> and this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> instance was retrieved through the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado ao definir essa propriedade é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> e essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> foi recuperada por meio da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for the bottom border of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da borda inferior de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado quando a configuração dessa propriedade não são valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle" /> válidos.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado ao definir essa propriedade é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.NotSet" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to be compared.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="other" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> and the values for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> properties are equal to their counterpart in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="other" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> e os valores para as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right" /> forem iguais à contraparte no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Object" /> atual.

trans-unit.target: O valor especificado ao definir essa propriedade é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble" /> e essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> tem um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> associado com um valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> de <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto que é uma cópia da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.ICloneable>.

trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.ToString%2A> método retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém os valores para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.All%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> propriedades.
